name: PixelBox (Checkster)
description:
You play as your score. Every digit has unique attack. Use them to increase your score for even more satisfying destruction.

CONTROLS

> WASD/arrows - Movement

>Space - Attack

> Mouse - Aim

DICLAIMER

> The game isn’t finished. There’s chance you may not be able to attack and progress. If that happens just press the R key.

> Camera shake and flashing lights are part of the game (They can’t be turned off in the current version).

> The game is just a demo but that does not mean you can’t have fun playing it. Enjoy the chaos!

ATTACKS

0 - Bomb

1 - Arrow

2 - Orbiting shield

3 - NOT ADDED YET

4 - Square Wave

5 - NOT ADDED YET

6 - NOT ADDED YET

7 - Scythe

8 - Laser

9 - Revolver
